remarks: Define the commutes relation (on the Hilbert lattice).  Definition of commutes in [Kalmbach] p. 20, who uses the notation xCy for "x commutes with y."  See ~ cmbri for membership relation.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-cm $p |- C_H = { <. x , y >. | ( ( x e. CH /\ y e. CH ) /\ x = ( ( x i^i y ) vH ( x i^i ( _|_ ` y ) ) ) ) } $.
$d x y $.
